front: What are the current SAP UI Tools?
What are the limitations of publishing CDS as OData service by adding a @OData.publish:true?

options.B: Cannot change name of entity sets
options.C: Only 1 level is taken into consideration when exposing associations
options.D: No customized ABAP code in SAP Gateway

front: In which cases, is local annotation better than a CDS annotation?

options.D: You want to use annotations which are not supported by your current ABAP version.

front: For a list report, which annotation is used to describe the name of business entity displayed on the report?
What is the use of the annotation @UI.hidden
back: Prevent a column selected by user when customizing table settings

front: Which of following description about search field is NOT true?

options.A: The Search field is searching on more than one data field.
options.B: There is only 1 search field per list report
options.C: Search field searches for only 1 data field

front: Choose available options for creating a value help for a selection field.

options.A: By adding a foreign key annotation
options.B: By adding a value help annotation
options.C: If the domain which associates to the field, has a fixed value, the value help will be generated automatically
options.D: By adding annotations to list all possible in source code of CDS

front: How do you set a field as the title for a business entity?
back: Add @UI.headerInfo.title.value for the CDS view and reference it to the field

front: The CDS annotation @UI.facet is used to

options.B: Create a collection facet, which is displayed section
options.C: Create a reference under collection facet
options.D: Create content, like field groups, or charts for a Facet

front: Which of the following properties are relevant to the type of facet?
If your backend system is based on ABAP 7.50, which are available ways of using facets?

options.A: Declare both: field groups and facets in CDS View
options.B: Declare both: field group and facet as local annotation using BAS
options.C: Declare field group in CDS View, declare facets as local annotation using BAS
options.D: It is not possible to use facets in ABAP 7.50

front: What can you do by editing manifest.json?

options.B: Add object page as sub page under an object page

front: What steps are used to display a field as a rating indicator?

options.A: Set type of line item as #AS_DATAPOINT
options.B: Add a @UI.datapoint to the field and set visualization to #RATING
options.C: Add a @UI.chart annotation to the field and set visualization to #RATING
options.D: Set the visualization of line item to #RATING

front: What are the differences between analytical entity set and normal entity set from an OData consumer perspective?

options.A: The analytical entity set, generates a new field for primary key
options.B: The analytical entity set, returns all data, needed to analyze the client
options.C: The analytical entity set, returns summarized results according to the $select parameter.
options.D: Analyzes the use of the database and runs faster when SAP HANA is used as a database compared to a normal entity set

front: Which of the following types are types of cards in an Overview Page?
Which areas are part of an Analytic List Page?
